intro: Urostigma doliarium, commonly known as the golden starbursts, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Fabaceae. It is native to parts of Africa and is characterized by its striking yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has compound leaves with small, oval-shaped leaflets and produces small, pod-like fruits. It thrives in well-drained soils and is often found in savanna and woodland habitats. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in gardens.
